verses.verse: <S%H1783>Dinah,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3812>Leah,<s%> whom she <S%H3205>bore<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

<S%H7927>Shechem<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2544>Hamor<s%> the <S%H2340>Hivite,<s%> the <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3947>her.<s%> He took <S%H7901>her,<s%> lay with <S%H6031>her,<s%> and humbled her.

His <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H1692>joined<s%> to <S%H1783>Dinah,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and he <S%H157>loved<s%> the young <S%H5291>lady,<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3820>kindly<s%> to the young <S%H5291>lady.<s%>
<S%H7927>Shechem<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to his <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H2544>Hamor,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3947>"Get<s%> me this young <S%H3207>lady<s%> as a <S%H802>wife.<s%>"

Now <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that he had <S%H2930>defiled<s%> <S%H1783>Dinah,<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter;<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> were with his <S%H4735>livestock<s%> in the <S%H7704>field.<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> held his <S%H2790>peace<s%> until they <S%H935>came.<s%>
<S%H2544>Hamor<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> to <S%H1696>talk<s%> with <S%H854>him.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> in from the <S%H7704>field<s%> when they <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H582>it.<s%> The men were <S%H6087>grieved,<s%> and they were <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2734>angry,<s%> because he had <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H5039>folly<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in <S%H7901>lying<s%> with <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter;<s%> a which thing ought not to be <S%H6213>done.<s%>

<S%H2544>Hamor<s%> <S%H1696>talked<s%> with <S%H559>them,<s%> saying, "The <S%H5315>soul<s%> of my <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> <S%H2836>longs<s%> for your <S%H1323>daughter.<s%> Please <S%H5414>give<s%> her to him as a <S%H802>wife.<s%>
Make <S%H2859>marriages<s%> with <S%H5414>us.<s%> Give your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to <S%H3947>us,<s%> and take our daughters for <S%H1323>yourselves.<s%>
You shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> with <S%H776>us,<s%> and the land will <S%H1961>be<s%> before <S%H6440>you.<s%> <S%H3427>Live<s%> and <S%H5503>trade<s%> in <S%H270>it,<s%> and get possessions in it."

<S%H7927>Shechem<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to her <S%H1>father<s%> and to her <S%H251>brothers,<s%> "Let me <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and whatever you will <S%H559>tell<s%> me I will <S%H5414>give.<s%>

<S%H7235>Ask<s%> me a <S%H3966>great<s%> <S%H4976>amount<s%> for a <S%H4119>dowry,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> whatever you <S%H559>ask<s%> of <S%H5414>me,<s%> but give me the young <S%H5291>lady<s%> as a <S%H802>wife.<s%>"

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> and <S%H2544>Hamor<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> with <S%H4820>deceit,<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke,<s%> because he had <S%H2930>defiled<s%> <S%H1783>Dinah<s%> their <S%H269>sister,<s%>

and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3808>them,<s%> "We can't <S%H6213>do<s%> this <S%H1697>thing,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> our <S%H269>sister<s%> to <S%H376>one<s%> who is <S%H6190>uncircumcised;<s%> for that is a reproach to <S%H2781>us.<s%>
Only on <S%H2063>this<s%> condition will we <S%H225>consent<s%> to <S%H2145>you.<s%> If you will be as we are, that every male of you be <S%H4135>circumcised;<s%>

then will we <S%H5414>give<s%> our <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to <S%H3947>you,<s%> and we will take your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to <S%H3427>us,<s%> and we will dwell with <S%H259>you,<s%> and we will become one <S%H5971>people.<s%>
But if you will not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to <S%H4135>us,<s%> to be circumcised, then we will <S%H3947>take<s%> our <S%H1323>sister,<s%> and we will be <S%H1980>gone.<s%>"
Their <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H3190>pleased<s%> <S%H2544>Hamor<s%> and <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> <S%H2544>Hamor<s%>'s <S%H1121>son.<s%>

The young <S%H5288>man<s%> <S%H309>didn't<s%> wait to <S%H6213>do<s%> this <S%H1697>thing,<s%> because he had <S%H2654>delight<s%> in <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> and he was <S%H3513>honored<s%> above all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H1>father.<s%>

<S%H2544>Hamor<s%> and <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of their <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H1696>talked<s%> with the <S%H582>men<s%> of their <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"These <S%H582>men<s%> are <S%H8003>peaceful<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H3427>us.<s%> Therefore let them live in the <S%H776>land<s%> and <S%H5503>trade<s%> in <S%H776>it.<s%> For behold, the land is <S%H7342>large<s%> <S%H3027>enough<s%> for <S%H6440>them.<s%> Let us <S%H3947>take<s%> their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to us for <S%H802>wives,<s%> and let us <S%H5414>give<s%> them our <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>

Only on this <S%H2063>condition<s%> will the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H225>consent<s%> to us to <S%H3427>live<s%> with <S%H259>us,<s%> to become one <S%H5971>people,<s%> if every <S%H2145>male<s%> among us is <S%H4135>circumcised,<s%> as they are <S%H4135>circumcised.<s%>

<S%H4735>Won't<s%> their livestock and their <S%H7075>possessions<s%> and all their <S%H929>animals<s%> be <S%H225>ours?<s%> Only let us give our consent to <S%H3427>them,<s%> and they will dwell with us."

All who went <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of his <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H8085>listened<s%> to <S%H2544>Hamor,<s%> and to <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> his <S%H1121>son;<s%> and every <S%H2145>male<s%> was <S%H4135>circumcised,<s%> all who went <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of his <S%H5892>city.<s%>

It happened on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> when they were <S%H3510>sore,<s%> that <S%H8147>two<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> and <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> <S%H1783>Dinah<s%>'s <S%H251>brothers,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> upon the <S%H983>unsuspecting<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H2026>killed<s%> all the <S%H2145>males.<s%>

They <S%H2026>killed<s%> <S%H2544>Hamor<s%> and <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H1783>Dinah<s%> <S%H3947>out<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> and went <S%H3318>away.<s%>
<S%H3290>Jacob<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> on the <S%H2491>dead,<s%> and <S%H962>plundered<s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> because they had <S%H2930>defiled<s%> their <S%H269>sister.<s%>
They <S%H3947>took<s%> their <S%H6629>flocks,<s%> their <S%H1241>herds,<s%> their <S%H2543>donkeys,<s%> that which was in the <S%H5892>city,<s%> that which was in the <S%H7704>field,<s%>

and all their <S%H2428>wealth.<s%> They took captive all their little <S%H2945>ones<s%> and their <S%H802>wives,<s%> and <S%H7617>took<s%> as <S%H962>plunder<s%> everything that was in the <S%H1004>house.<s%>

<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> and <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> "You have <S%H5916>troubled<s%> <S%H3427>me,<s%> to make me odious to the inhabitants of the <S%H776>land,<s%> among the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzites.<s%> I am <S%H4962>few<s%> in <S%H4557>number.<s%> They will gather themselves <S%H622>together<s%> against <S%H5221>me<s%> and strike <S%H5221>me,<s%> and I will be <S%H8045>destroyed,<s%> I and my <S%H1004>house.<s%>"
They <S%H559>said,<s%> "Should he <S%H6213>deal<s%> with our <S%H269>sister<s%> as with a <S%H2181>prostitute?<s%>"
